channel.title: Language Model on Chakshu Dhannawat
channel.description: Recent content in Language Model on Chakshu Dhannawat

item.title: ML-Experimentation
item.description: This is also not a project, but instead a collection of google colab notebooks, where I try to test the recenly released machine learning models such as DALLE-2, Imagen, Language models such as BLOOM,GPT-3 etc. I will be adding many more google colab files into this github repository in the future. This repository contains the experimentation that I will perform on the recent advancements in AI. Mostly related to the recent research papers released in the community, and the machine learning models that have become quite popular.
